content: Suppose I have just run a tactic (more precisely executed a TacticM Unit term) that has added stuff to the InfoView by using a logInfo (Aesop.Main.search in my case) and I get infotrees using `getInfoTrees. Is there a way to extract this stuff from the InfoTrees? What kind of node has this info?
logInfo doesn't go in the info tree, it goes in the message log returned by getMessageLog
Siddhartha Gadgil has marked this topic as resolved.
